comment: What really makes me angry about this is that WB is just dismissing all of us calling for AH's removal as nothing more then angry "Johnny Depp fans/stans" when that is not the case at all. I have seen thousands & thousands of comments on other channels from the people who are supporting Johnny Depp, & what WB doesn't seem to be willing to acknowledge is that many of these people are not even "fans" of his movies. Many of these people are supporting him because they were dv victims themselves who, having been through abuse, know a real abuser when they see one, & they all say the same thing, that the abuser in that relationship was not Johnny Depp, it was AH. Yet WB still continues to push this narrative that the backlash is all because of "Depp fans" & dismissing the thousands of real dv victims who are being retraumatised from seeing AH held up as a fellow victim & advocate for abuse victims when she's a proven lier & abuser, it's sickening.
author: Kirsty Fairly
